<!DOCTYPE html>
			<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  				<head>
    				<meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8"/>
    				<script type="text/javascript">
    					function rot(letter, offset) {
    						var letters = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";
    						var idx = letters.indexOf(letter);
    						
    						return letters[(idx + offset) % 25];
    					}
    					
      					function encrypt(elem) {
      						var text = elem.value;
      						var newtext = text.substring(0, text.length - 2);
      						var newletter = text.substring(text.length - 2, text.length - 1);
      						
      						newtext += rot(newletter, 13);
      						
      						elem.value = newtext;
      					}
      					
      					function decrypt(elem_id) {
      						var elem = document.getElementByID(elem_id);
      						var text = elem.value;
      						var newtext = "";
      						
      						for (var i = 0; i < text.length; ++i) {
      							newtext += rot(text[i], 13);
      						}
      						
      						elem.value = newtext;
      					}
    				</script>
  				</head>
  				<body>
  					<form>
  						<textarea id="spoiler_text" onkeypress="encrypt(this)" rows="4" cols="5" />
  						<input type="button" value="Decrypt" onclick="decrypt(spoiler_text")" />
  					</form>
  				</body>
			</html>
